criticalIssues.error: ResponsiveTheme used in StyleSheet.create - executes at module load time
criticalIssues.description: App crashes during initialization - ROOT CAUSE LIKELY FOUND

criticalIssues.error: ResponsiveTheme creation calls responsive functions at module load time
criticalIssues.description: THEME loading fails - matches reported crash symptoms

recommendations.action: IMMEDIATE: Refactor THEME loading to use lazy initialization
recommendations.impact: Fixes root cause of APK crashes

recommendations.action: Move ResponsiveTheme creation from module-level to runtime
recommendations.impact: Prevents Dimensions.get crashes during module loading

recommendations.action: Break circular dependencies in import chain

recommendations.impact: Ensures type safety and prevents runtime errors
